feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: A universal shriek arose as the russet boots waved wildly from the wreck, and a golden head emerged, exclaiming, 'I told you so! I told you so!'
feels.exactPlace: During the performance of the Operatic Tragedy

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: A good deal of hammering went on before the curtain rose again; but when it became evident what a masterpiece of stage-carpentering had been got up, no one murmured at the delay.
feels.exactPlace: During the preparation for the evening festivities

feels.name: Joy
feels.quote: It was like Marmee to get up a little treat for them; but anything so fine as this was unheard-of since the departed days of plenty.
